title: Alucard1
author: Alucard1
content: So I just created a video on my TikTok ( I am not a famous TikTok creator, I just upload some videos on my account ), I created a video regarding my trading gains, it's just a clip of some of my gains from 6 months and I am so thankful because there are so many who appreciate my posts, comments and dm me in my TikTok accounts, what more for those influencers with many followers in their TikTok accounts or any social media accounts, which is a great medium to promote cryptocurrency. These are the common questions I've got from some of my viewers1. How do you earn money from trading?2. How to trade or invest?3. Can you help me have those gains as well?Conclusion: I just realized that there are still a lot of people in our country who are interested in crypto and willing to learn, I also promote this forum to them, especially to those users who asked about cryptocurrency. Hopefully, they are now here and comment on this post.Some only want gains and not to learn about crypto, they only want an easy success without knowing how risky it is.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Alucard1 on May 09, 2023, 08:46:51 AMConclusion: I just realized that there are still a lot of people in our country who are interested in crypto and willing to learn, I also promote this forum to them, I am not one of your followers, but i want to say, you solely mentioned that, you shared your "gains videos" and you still amazed to get so much interaction from them, what if you would have uploaded your lose videos too, will you then get the same feedback.I am not disrespecting you, but most of the people do the same, they just upload profit videos and show people gree gardens (idk the word) but when people come to the trading (garden) they then understand there is loss too. You got this much feedback just because people like newbies who have only this idea "trade is just buying low and selling high" and when they saw your videos they will think, this shouldÂ  be my sensei, he knows the tricks he(you), because he is gaining profit in all of his trades.I know, you have no intentions to misguide them or use there doubts as in your own benefits, i just want to point out that we should not only show the good of market while we should show the bad of it too. So that they would know the true nature of it.

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: What you should do, if you want to make bitcoin more successful, is to create entertaining videos that explain:- What Bitcoin is- What Bitcoin can be used for- How Bitcoin worksThis will make the right people interested in bitcoin and not only attract gamblers that will leave bitcoin as soon as they see the next business opportunity.If you just want to make money with your videos however, go ahead and do what ever you like. This is just the advice I can give you.

A lot of people see Bitcoin just as a gamble where you can get a lot of money fast, but it's necessary to tell those who are interested that BTC is a long-term investment if they want to use it like that. But it also can be used as currency.

comments.author: demonica
comments.body: Not to generalize but I think some of those people who asked how you earn money aren't really interested in crypto. Since they've seen your video where you gain money, they want to earn money as well probably thinking that it's sort of easy money. But if you'd try to tell them how it works and teach them the basics in entering crypto trading, I don't think all of them are really willing to explore. TikTok can be a great medium to promote Bitcoin since there are a lot of users and your videos can appear on their screen even without them following you. But I feel like a lot of people there can easily be convinced with something due to hype but won't really do their own research. However, I won't be against if you want to use your platform to educate about Bitcoin. It would be great as well if you are willing to create more videos explaining Bitcoin cause you could help others who are really interested to learn. Just don't forget to remind them to do their own research.

This is just the advice I can give you.Agreed. Tiktok, being the popular way to show off short videos these days, would seem to be a great way to spread Bitcoin awareness with short concise educational videos about Bitcoin, as long as you make them interesting.And yeah often when someone asks me how I retired early and I say Bitcoin they almost inevitably mention the word gambling and I'm just like omg no I invested there is no gambling lol. I guess people's line of thinking is "investment I don't understand" -> risky -> must be gambling

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Alucard1 on May 09, 2023, 08:46:51 AM[....]what more for those influencers with many followers in their TikTok accounts or any social media accounts, which is a great medium to promote cryptocurrency.This already happened in the last year or so. Many of the so-called influencers have been shilling any crypto-related projects like those P2E games when it was still popular. Some of them even "teach" trading like they were some kind of guru during the last bullrun even though it's somewhat obvious they were just new to the game. Many of them promoted scams too which led to many newbies losing more.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Many people are still interested in crypto but are struggling to find a good place to learn or start.You can start making and spreading more videos about crypto/bitcoins and not only about the profit you get from trading but also about investing lessons.I make money trading by buying low and selling high and so far, it's still going well, although I've also had frequent losing trades.And to benefit from trading, you have to learn more because by learning that, you can have the expertise to analyze the market.The smarter you analyse, the more chances you have to make money trading.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Don't get surprised to see a lot people are interested to invest in cryptocurrency because every people in this world are want to become rich. People who replied your post are mostly only interested to make a quick profit by flipping their money to shitcoins. I'm not arguing if most people invest in cryptocurrency because of the volatility, but they must need to understand about the coins and why they're choose it among the other coins.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: I appreciate your efforts in trying to make crypto popular.However the common audience in tiktok and other social media channels are the younger generation who has less money making attitude and more of a get-rich-quick attitude. The diligent investors are not going to visit these channels to waste their time rather use that for their own education, career development and personal finance, including own crypto investment.Be sure to put crypto in an unbiased light here, showing its pros and cons and why it is not a get-rich-quick scheme. But the problem of this approach is that you will lose viewers because the people lost interest. Instead of you take the path of lies, showing off your gains and promoting shitcoins, more people will come in because you just promoted their "bubble" of thought of easy money. That is how influencers who spam these stuff work and make money.
